data.title: 1 James Cook Apartments
data.meta_description: 3 bedroom apartment located seconds from Clarkes Beach
data.text:
The Home

Situated opposite Byron Bay’s gorgeous Clarkes Beach is #1 James Cook - a charming 3 bedroom holiday apartment that’s ideally suited to a relaxed seaside getaway.

The double-storey property features an open-plan living, dining, and kitchen space on the ground floor, with the home’s light-filled bedrooms positioned on the second level - maximising space to entertain and unwind.

1 James Cook boasts 2 patio areas - a delightful outdoor dining space at the front of the property, plus a rear-facing BBQ area - with guests also able to enjoy the communal swimming pool (not heated).

With the beach on your doorstep, and Byron’s top attractions close by - including the town centre and Cape Byron - #1 James Cook ticks all the boxes for a chilled getaway in The Bay.

Property Features:

- 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, sleeps 6

- Located directly opposite Clarkes Beach (100m)

- 2 patio spaces with...
